questions.question: What is the dominant color of the device's main body?

What type of display technology does the device incorporate?
What is the overall shape of the main electronic component?
What is the color of the numerical display on the device?
What seems to be the function suggested by the buttons present?

What type of fastening is used for the lanyard attachment?

What is the apparent condition of the device in the image?
What is the apparent material of the small components, like buttons?
